verses.verse: For the YY <S%H3068><s%> will have mercy <S%H7355><s%> <S%H8762><s%> on Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>, and will yet choose <S%H977><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, and set <S%H3240><s%> <S%H8689><s%> them in their own land <S%H127><s%>: and the strangers <S%H1616><s%> shall be joined <S%H3867><s%> <S%H8738><s%> with them, and they shall cleave <S%H5596><s%> <S%H8738><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>.

And the people <S%H5971><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them, and bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8689><s%> them to their place <S%H4725><s%>: and the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> shall possess <S%H5157><s%> <S%H8694><s%> them in the land <S%H127><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> for servants <S%H5650><s%> and handmaids <S%H8198><s%>: and they shall take them captives <S%H7617><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, whose captives <S%H7617><s%> <S%H8802><s%> they were; and they shall rule <S%H7287><s%> <S%H8804><s%> over their oppressors <S%H5065><s%> <S%H8802><s%>.

And it shall come to pass in the day <S%H3117><s%> that the YY <S%H3068><s%> shall give thee rest <S%H5117><s%> <S%H8687><s%> from thy sorrow <S%H6090><s%>, and from thy fear <S%H7267><s%>, and from the hard <S%H7186><s%> bondage <S%H5656><s%> wherein thou wast made to serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8795><s%>,

That thou shalt take up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8804><s%> this proverb <S%H4912><s%> against the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, How hath the oppressor <S%H5065><s%> <S%H8802><s%> ceased <S%H7673><s%> <S%H8804><s%> ! the golden city <S%H4062><s%> ceased <S%H7673><s%> <S%H8804><s%> !
The YY <S%H3068><s%> hath broken <S%H7665><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the staff <S%H4294><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%>, and the sceptre <S%H7626><s%> of the rulers <S%H4910><s%> <S%H8802><s%>.

He who smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8688><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> in wrath <S%H5678><s%> with a continual <S%H1115><s%> <S%H5627><s%> stroke <S%H4347><s%>, he that ruled <S%H7287><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> in anger <S%H639><s%>, is persecuted <S%H4783><s%>, and none <S%H1097><s%> hindereth <S%H2820><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.
The whole earth <S%H776><s%> is at rest <S%H5117><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and is quiet <S%H8252><s%> <S%H8804><s%>: they break forth <S%H6476><s%> <S%H8804><s%> into singing <S%H7440><s%>.

Yea, the fir trees <S%H1265><s%> rejoice <S%H8055><s%> <S%H8804><s%> at thee, and the cedars <S%H730><s%> of Lebanon <S%H3844><s%>, saying, Since thou art laid down <S%H7901><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, no feller <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8802><s%> is come up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against us.

SH'ol <S%H7585><s%> from beneath is moved <S%H7264><s%> <S%H8804><s%> for thee to meet <S%H7125><s%> <S%H8800><s%> thee at thy coming <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%>: it stirreth up <S%H5782><s%> <S%H8790><s%> the dead <S%H7496><s%> for thee, even all the chief ones <S%H6260><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>; it hath raised up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8689><s%> from their thrones <S%H3678><s%> all the kings <S%H4428><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%>.

All they shall speak <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto thee, Art thou also become weak <S%H2470><s%> <S%H8795><s%> as we? art thou become like <S%H4911><s%> <S%H8738><s%> unto us?

Thy pomp <S%H1347><s%> is brought down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8717><s%> to the grave <S%H7585><s%>, and the noise <S%H1998><s%> of thy viols <S%H5035><s%>: the worm <S%H7415><s%> is spread <S%H3331><s%> <S%H8714><s%> under thee, and the worms <S%H8438><s%> cover <S%H4374><s%> thee.

How art thou fallen <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8804><s%> from heaven <S%H8064><s%>, O Lucifer <S%H1966><s%>, son <S%H1121><s%> of the morning <S%H7837><s%> <S%H8676><s%> <S%H3213><s%> <S%H8685><s%> ! how art thou cut down <S%H1438><s%> <S%H8738><s%> to the ground <S%H776><s%>, which didst weaken <S%H2522><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> !

For thou hast said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in thine heart <S%H3824><s%>, I will ascend <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into heaven <S%H8064><s%>, I will exalt <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8686><s%> my throne <S%H3678><s%> above <S%H4605><s%> the stars <S%H3556><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H410><s%>: I will sit <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> also upon the mount <S%H2022><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>, in the sides <S%H3411><s%> of the north <S%H6828><s%>:
I will ascend <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%> above the heights <S%H1116><s%> of the clouds <S%H5645><s%>; I will be like <S%H1819><s%> <S%H8691><s%> Ha `Elyon <S%H5945><s%>.
Yet thou shalt be brought down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8714><s%> to SH'ol <S%H7585><s%>, to the sides <S%H3411><s%> of the pit <S%H953><s%>.

They that see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8802><s%> thee shall narrowly look <S%H7688><s%> <S%H8686><s%> upon thee, and consider <S%H995><s%> <S%H8709><s%> thee, saying, Is this the man <S%H376><s%> that made the earth <S%H776><s%> to tremble <S%H7264><s%> <S%H8688><s%>, that did shake <S%H7493><s%> <S%H8688><s%> kingdoms <S%H4467><s%>;

That made <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the world <S%H8398><s%> as a wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, and destroyed <S%H2040><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> thereof; that opened <S%H6605><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not the house <S%H1004><s%> of his prisoners <S%H615><s%> ?
All the kings <S%H4428><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%>, even all of them, lie <S%H7901><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in glory <S%H3519><s%>, every one <S%H376><s%> in his own house <S%H1004><s%>.

But thou art cast out <S%H7993><s%> <S%H8717><s%> of thy grave <S%H6913><s%> like an abominable <S%H8581><s%> <S%H8737><s%> branch <S%H5342><s%>, and as the raiment <S%H3830><s%> of those that are slain <S%H2026><s%> <S%H8803><s%>, thrust through <S%H2944><s%> <S%H8794><s%> with a sword <S%H2719><s%>, that go down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to the stones <S%H68><s%> of the pit <S%H953><s%>; as a carcase <S%H6297><s%> trodden under feet <S%H947><s%> <S%H8716><s%>.

Thou shalt not be joined <S%H3161><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with them in burial <S%H6900><s%>, because thou hast destroyed <S%H7843><s%> <S%H8765><s%> thy land <S%H776><s%>, and slain <S%H2026><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thy people <S%H5971><s%>: the seed <S%H2233><s%> of evildoers <S%H7489><s%> <S%H8688><s%> shall never <S%H5769><s%> be renowned <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8735><s%>.

Prepare <S%H3559><s%> <S%H8685><s%> slaughter <S%H4293><s%> for his children <S%H1121><s%> for the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>; that they do not <S%H1077><s%> rise <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, nor possess <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>, nor fill <S%H4390><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of the world <S%H8398><s%> with cities <S%H6145><s%> <S%H8676><s%> <S%H5892><s%>.

For I will rise up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8804><s%> against them, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>, and cut off <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8689><s%> from Babylon <S%H894><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%>, and remnant <S%H7605><s%>, and son <S%H5209><s%>, and nephew <S%H5220><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

I will also make <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it a possession <S%H4180><s%> for the bittern <S%H7090><s%>, and pools <S%H98><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%>: and I will sweep <S%H2894><s%> <S%H8773><s%> it with the besom <S%H4292><s%> of destruction <S%H8045><s%> <S%H8687><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>.

The YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%> hath sworn <S%H7650><s%> <S%H8738><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Surely as I have thought <S%H1819><s%> <S%H8765><s%>, so shall it come to pass; and as I have purposed <S%H3289><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, so shall it stand <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%>:

That I will break <S%H7665><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the Ashurn <S%H804><s%> in my land <S%H776><s%>, and upon my mountains <S%H2022><s%> tread him under foot <S%H947><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: then shall his yoke <S%H5923><s%> depart <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8804><s%> from off them, and his burden <S%H5448><s%> depart <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from off their shoulders <S%H7926><s%>.

This is the purpose <S%H6098><s%> that is purposed <S%H3289><s%> <S%H8803><s%> upon the whole earth <S%H776><s%>: and this is the hand <S%H3027><s%> that is stretched out <S%H5186><s%> <S%H8803><s%> upon all the nations <S%H1471><s%>.

For the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%> hath purposed <S%H3289><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and who shall disannul <S%H6565><s%> <S%H8686><s%> it? and his hand <S%H3027><s%> is stretched out <S%H5186><s%> <S%H8803><s%>, and who shall turn it back <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8686><s%> ?
In the year <S%H8141><s%> that king <S%H4428><s%> Ahaz <S%H271><s%> died <S%H4194><s%> was this burden <S%H4853><s%>.

Rejoice <S%H8055><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not thou, whole Palestina <S%H6429><s%>, because the rod <S%H7626><s%> of him that smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8688><s%> thee is broken <S%H7665><s%> <S%H8738><s%>: for out of the serpent's <S%H5175><s%> root <S%H8328><s%> shall come forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a cockatrice <S%H6848><s%>, and his fruit <S%H6529><s%> shall be a fiery <S%H8314><s%> flying <S%H5774><s%> <S%H8789><s%> serpent <S%H8314><s%>.

And the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of the poor <S%H1800><s%> shall feed <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and the needy <S%H34><s%> shall lie down <S%H7257><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in safety <S%H983><s%>: and I will kill <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8689><s%> thy root <S%H8328><s%> with famine <S%H7458><s%>, and he shall slay <S%H2026><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thy remnant <S%H7611><s%>.

Howl <S%H3213><s%> <S%H8685><s%>, O gate <S%H8179><s%>; cry <S%H2199><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, O city <S%H5892><s%>; thou, whole Palestina <S%H6429><s%>, art dissolved <S%H4127><s%> <S%H8738><s%>: for there shall come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> from the north <S%H6828><s%> a smoke <S%H6227><s%>, and none shall be alone <S%H909><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in his appointed times <S%H4151><s%>.

What shall one then answer <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the messengers <S%H4397><s%> of the nation <S%H1471><s%>? That the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath founded <S%H3245><s%> <S%H8765><s%> TZiyon <S%H6726><s%>, and the poor <S%H6041><s%> of his people <S%H5971><s%> shall trust <S%H2620><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in it.
